mapper.insert: insert into xiaocubaoblog_db.tb_articles ( article_id, article_title, article_sketch, user_id, content_id, create_time, update_time ) values ( #{articleId}, #{articleTitle}, #{articleSketch}, #{userId}, #{contentId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} );
mapper.select: select article_id, article_title, article_sketch, (select user_name from xiaocubaoblog_db.tb_users where tb_users.user_id = a.user_id limit 1) as user_name, create_time from xiaocubaoblog_db.tb_articles a order by create_time desc ;

select a.article_id, a.content_id, a.article_title, c.content_text, u.user_name, a.create_time from xiaocubaoBlog_db.tb_articles a , xiaocubaoBlog_db.tb_users u, xiaocubaoBlog_db.tb_content c where a.user_id = u.user_id and a.content_id = c.content_id and a.article_id = #{articleId} limit 1 ;
